SELECT hrs.rule_script_id, httl.tenant_name, hrs.server_name, hrs.script_code, hrst.script_description, hrs.script_type_code, hrs.script_content, hrs.tenant_id, hrs.enabled_flag, hrs.category, hrs.object_version_number FROM hpfm_rule_script hrs left join hpfm_rule_script_tl hrst on hrst.rule_script_id = hrs.rule_script_id and hrst.lang = #{lang} join hpfm_tenant ht on ht.tenant_id = hrs.tenant_id LEFT JOIN hpfm_tenant_tl httl ON ht.tenant_id = httl.tenant_id AND httl.lang = #{lang} WHERE 1=1 AND hrs.rule_script_id = #{ruleScriptId}
AND hrs.tenant_id = #{tenantId}

SELECT hrs.rule_script_id, hrs.server_name, hrs.script_code, hrs.script_description, hrs.script_type_code, hrs.script_content, hrs.tenant_id, hrs.enabled_flag, hrs.category, hrs.object_version_number FROM hpfm_rule_script hrs WHERE hrs.script_code = #{scriptCode} AND hrs.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
